sun.exampleSentence: The sun sets behind the trees.

clouds.exampleSentence: Dark clouds gathered in the sky.

tree.exampleSentence: A bird is sitting in the tree.

bush.exampleSentence: The cat hid behind the bush.

bench.exampleSentence: She sat on the bench to read her book.

grass.exampleSentence: The grass was wet with morning dew.
